scripts.build:headless: rm -f .npmrc && npm run link:init -- headless && npx --no-install kui-build-headless /tmp ../../node_modules/@kui-shell/prescan.json; npm run link:done
scripts.build:electron: build() { cp ../../.npmrc . && npm run link:init -- electron && npx --no-install kui-build-electron /tmp $1; npm run link:done; }; build
scripts.build:proxy: rm -f .npmrc && npm run link:init -- webpack && npx --no-install kui-build-proxy /tmp; npm run link:done
scripts.build:webpack: rm -f .npmrc && npm run link:init -- webpack && npx --no-install kui-build-webpack /tmp; npm run link:done
